website_summaries.verdict: These are the perfect sun shirts for a day at the beach because they transition seamlessly from land to water and back again.
pros: Can be worn in the water or out of the water
cons: These shirts tend to run a little large, so consider going a size down

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for modest men! The fit is somewhat loose, so it's very forgiving. My husband always struggles to find shirts that fit his long arms, these are perfect. The length is also great. It covers his entire hips. The fabric is thinner than other rashguards I have bought, perfect for hot weather. My husband is 6 ft tall and weighs 225 pounds. He usually wears a size 36 or 38 pant and a large dress shirt or XL t-shirt. Also, the white is pretty transparent. The new blue is a very dark navy. My favorite was the ocean color. I put a striped colored underwear underneath the white so you can see it's somewhat transparent.
customer_reviews.author: GIFT CARD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: After buying multiple women's rash guard tops that were very tight across the bust and ride up on the midriff, I decided to look at men's. This is perfect for my needs! I'm going snorkeling and kayaking and finally found a rash guard for a girl with, well, "girls" (DD). It's long on me, but I'm short, so I'm not surprised by that and I honestly prefer it. I also could potentially have gone one size smaller. I've worn it for aqua fitness and it isn't so loose it billows up, but it does allow me a full range of motion without feeling like a sausage through the bust.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Diva

customer_reviews.title: Light Protection
customer_reviews.text: As expected. SPF shirts aren't terribly exciting but as long as they get the job done they're a no brainer! Lightweight and rated SPF 50. The fabric feels like it will snag easily. Accurate sizing if a little on the big side; it fits like a t-shirt so size down if you wanted it more fitted. It also feels a tad softer & lighter than the usual fitted rash guards. These came without stickers or tags, not sure why. Other Speedo products I've ordered (including swim tees) always come with tags and stickers. Not a big deal but something to note if you wanted to give it as a gift. Without tags there is no explanation about its SPF properties.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Fit was MUCH bigger than expected. My husband is 6'4", 200# and usually wears an XLT so I bought the XL. Sleeves were 3 inches past his wrists and it was very loose in the chest. If you are looking for an over-sized baggy fit, this is a great shirt. Nice fabric, true to color. If you are looking for a more athletic fit, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Love this long sleeve swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: After trying several different brands, my search is over - the Speedo Men's UV long sleeve swim shirt is the best for the money I've found. I prefer a loose fit long sleeve swim shirt and at 6'4" and 230 lbs it is difficult to find one that is both long enough (body and sleeves) and loose enough without it being too baggy. After going through a number of brands both expensive and discounted, I'm convienced the Speedo offers the best value for what I'm looking for. My only very minor and admittingly nit picking issue is that the collor of the shirt is a little wider than I would prefer but not so bad that it looks ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Marv J

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shirt except for one thing -- the material?!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this swim shirt because almost everything about it is perfect, with the exception of the material... it's just too flimsy. After the first wear to the beach and one wash, it started to fray on the sleeve. Speedo was nice enough to replace it even though it was worn (thanks for the effort). The same thing happened to the replacement although it took two or three washes this time. Obviously I wasn't going to try to return it again after 2 or 3 washes so now I have a $25 shirt that I only wear to bed b/c it looks deplorable. Seriously Speedo -- you need to find a better vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection! My husband will be wearing it all summer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just got this and has worn it once, but loves it. He got a really bad sunburn a week ago and didn't want any more sun exposure and this did the trick! The fit is loose and he loves that it isn't tight. He wore it in the pool and got out in almost 100 degrees, but it kept him cool since it was wet. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit, not baggy. Better than sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 175lbs I have an athletic build and slim waist (I wear 32×32 jeans). The shirt would be great for all outside activities, except swimming. It is loose enough it feels saggy when it is completely saturated which can be annoying. When it is dry is is perfect and breaths very well. I got the dark blue option and wore it on a raft trip and it kept me cool and sunburn free! It is a keeper but still looking for the perfect swimming shirt...
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend you buy a size smaller than you take in ...
customer_reviews.text: I take an XXL in tee shirts so I bought the same in this swim shirt. It was HUGE! I know it is supposed to be loose fitting but this was way overboard. I would recommend you buy a size smaller than you take in a tee shirt. I am re-ordering this product in an XL size and hope it fits better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Little baggier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I like zero details on sun shirts (designs) and had the sleeveless version. It’s kind of baggy more like a shirt than a rash-guard. I didn’t expect it to be surfer dude right but a little more fitted. And the sleeves are pretty long. Like the fabric and the color. Wanted it to be a little more form fitting but I use it at the beach and not for, say, fishing so it’s wet a lot. Good quality. Decent price. No designs :-)
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kidman

customer_reviews.title: Runs way big and snags frays way too easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a large shirt person and this fits like an XL shirt. Should have ordered a medium. This is what my shirt looks like after 2 wearings. There is zero durability to this shirt. It is only for wearing in water, do not do any other activity such as carry a cooler and let it rub on the shirt or heck, go fishing and allow the pole to rub on the shirt. Crazy
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I read other reviews for sizing and found the sizing down recommendations to be perfect. My husband wore this for our August week-long trip to Grand Cayman, where the sun was hot and strong. It protected his shoulders and torso beautifully. No sunsburns! And it was comfortable enough to transition from swimming, snorkeling, beach play, etc. without any discomfort. I'd highly recommend for anyone seeking strong sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: S. Newark

customer_reviews.title: not true to size
customer_reviews.text: bought an XL long sleeve for my 16-1/2 inches neck and 33 inches arms. the XL size is tight around the shoulders and the sleeves are 3 plus inches too long. folding up the sleeves do not work for swimming since they come loose instantly in the pool. did not bother returning it and now using it as a gardening shirt with sleeves rolled up. really disappointed that this Speedo shirt is not "loose fit" and long sleeve is "extra extra long"
customer_reviews.author: mRj

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, AVOID WHITE
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Black version of this product about a year ago, and it worked great. Its light and doesn't cling too much even when wet. However, I recently purchased the White version and I was immediately disappointed. Sunscreen applied on my neck stained the collar and the arms also are stained in a similar manner (probably from sunscreen on my hands after application, or contact with my kids). Washing the shirt didn't remove the stains at all. For a product that is meant for outdoor activity, it really should hold up to sunscreen better than it did. The sunscreen was a common brand, so we're not talking about any strange chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the fabric is really light and covers really good against UV rays
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in XL for my husband who is a big guy (286lb and 6ft) and I thought it was going to be tight for him. It actually fits well, at least how he wanted it to fit (some what loose but not too much it gets up on the water), the fabric is really light and covers really good against UV rays, also dries up quickly. The sleeves are a little bit long but tolerable. I'm very happy with it, I'm buying another one for my father-in-law...
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: Easier than sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for being outside, I was tired of forgetting to apply sunscreen all the time. This shirt is very lightweight and dries quickly when it gets wet. I never get too hot outside in this either even though it is long sleeves. I actually want to pick up another one or two to have on hand. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Looks hot on my husband!
customer_reviews.text: My husband previously used an O'Neal rash guard compression fit. He is 6'4 and 220. He has recently gained about 15 lbs and was self conscious about how the tight fit looked. I was worried that a loose fit would look like he was hiding something, or worse look floppy and still show his love handles. I was totally wrong. He looks hot! So much better than the compression and it doesn't look like he's hiding a thing! We ordered him an XL, he normally wears a TL, but could have done with a L. He is also wearing black, and if you want to hide anything, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving yourself from the sun
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt, it feels good and it’s comfortable for him. He wears it all the time. I purchased it for him to wear to the beach or out in the yard. So far it works in the yard, we haven’t worn it to the beach yet which is why I gave it a 4 star. This is great for a younger man or older man. Update on this: as the temperature has risen outside, my husband said the shirt is too hot. He still likes wearing it around the house or on cooler days but he has shirts he’s paid less for that does better
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Swim Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting swim shirt. It fits like a T shirt, not form-fitting, but looser around the body area. The long sleeves protect your arms from the sun. My husband liked it very much. I tried it on, liked it, and ordered another one in my size. I didn't want from-fitting because my swim suit has some ruffles, and it would feel odd. So this turned out to be perfect for both my husband and I.
customer_reviews.author: Hug1

customer_reviews.title: Baggy, Droopy Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little large, which makes it very baggy in the water. The sleeves aren’t tapered so that makes it feel even baggier and not great for swimming. And from previous experience with rash guards of this type, I expect it’s only going to get baggier over time. Just lounging in the water, I suppose it’s fine but I wish it were a little sleeker.
customer_reviews.author: waetherman

customer_reviews.title: Size Down for sure
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not worn this in the water, yet, it seems to be a pretty well-made item with strong stitching, etc. Please note about sizing: size down for sure --> I am 6'1" and weigh about 190 and the large was way too big (had to return). The medium fits me much better, and is still not snug at all, and there is plenty of length in the arms and down below the waist. I would think that if I wanted this to actually fit tightly I could even go with a small, but that's not how I want it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: mt2

customer_reviews.title: disposable rubbish
customer_reviews.text: On the first use it stretched so much that after only 35 minutes swimming, air bubbles were traveling up and down my sleeves and down my back. It is made of the most inferior quality material imaginable: very thin, hardly any tail to tuck into a swimming suit, and single seams instead of double. After one use, I threw it in the trash. The rash guard I wore for four months was stronger than this after just one use. Don't buy Speedo.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Kogan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a men's large since i have bigger shoulders that gets squeezed in a medium tee shirt. I ordered a medium rash guard based on these reviews and it was a good call. Plenty of room with the smaller size. Very comfy and lightweight for sun protection on the water.
customer_reviews.author: John Catapano

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall guys
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6'2" and about 210 lbs. I had read it runs big and so I bought the medium, and it fits perfectly - not skin tight, but not so big it would float up. The sleeves are very long though (great for my boyfriend, probably not so great if you're under 6').
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Good cover-up
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit on the roomy side, but the sleeve length is good. I border medium/large, so it's a dice roll picking those sizes. Sleeves tell the tale. Good length. Material is solid and good stitching. Overall shirt is a touch baggy in mid sleeve and mid body - odd fitting. It's a good cover-up for sun and water/contact rash.
customer_reviews.author: Ursa

customer_reviews.title: Great style, but runs about 2 sizes big.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shirt in a size small for my husband. I could see from the reviews that it ran big, but the smallest size available was small, so I could not size down. The "small" is the equivalent of a size large. Very long sleeves too. Otherwise he loves the shirt, so it is very disappointing that it doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Penn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my DH, and he says it is great. He has worn it around our house during the summer and kept him cool. The big test is our vacation to Hawaii soon. The last couple of years, his arms got too tan from the Hawaiian sun. I have washed it and let it hang to dry and it dried quickly. He is a size large and it fit loose, which was good. Shipping was fast and will probably buy a few more eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Sexy? No. Works? Yes.
customer_reviews.text: I am married with two kids and a smokin' hot wife. I am not at the beach to pick up babes: if you are, maybe don't buy this shirt. However, if you want to avoid sunburn, then this is the shirt for you. Spent 5 days in July on Captiva Island in Florida. Provided excellent protection and was very easy to swim in.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I never want a sunburn again, especially on my neck, shoulders and arms. Living in southern California, you need to cover up, especially in the pool or ocean and this shirt does the trick. Comfortable wet or dry and sun protection has been excellent while playing water volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: mkpi

customer_reviews.title: Fits and feels like an over sized sweater.
customer_reviews.text: Fits and feels like an over sized sweater. This shirt was too large both in the body and the arms; it fits more like 1 size up. Had no interest in wearing this thing to the pool. Maybe I will buy a size smaller, but I will look elsewhere first.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend after reading the reviews and comparing it to other similar products. He prefers a loose fit. I examined the shirt carefully when it arrived because one review suggested that it wasn't well made. I've purchased a lot of rash guards over the years and this one seemed to be sturdy, well put together, and well made. He loved the color and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant traveler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sun block alternative
customer_reviews.text: Straight away, as others have said, order a size smaller than usual and it will fit perfect. This is so light weight and so much easier than worrying about sun block all day long. I wish I would have gone this route long ago. Cannot say enough good things about this sun block alternative.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: reasonably priced sun shirt
customer_reviews.text: Good substitute for a t-shirt with the added bonus of sun protection. The white one becomes see through when wet and the shirt was on the larger side. I purchased a second one, the green in a size down, and am very pleased with the fit and quality of the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, works well
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. I bought this and another shirt for my week vacation in the sun. I'm 60 and have had melanoma and wanted something that offered strong protection in the pool and ocean while fitting well. Something I could wear all the time in or near water. This shirt did the job, had a nice loose fit, drained well and was super comfortable. I purchased another shirt from another supplier that fit skin tight, was not what I wanted and I did not take on the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Mouch

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the sun block lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It's a bit large but not restrictive at all and considering I don't end up with a sun-burn it's amazing! Going to a water park for 8-10 hours I would put on sun-block, or try to, every 90 minutes as directed but I still got burned. Wearing this thing... there's no forgetting, there's no spots that I missed, no spots that weren't applied heavily enough - I just end up without a sun-burn! This thing pays for itself in money saved on sun-block over the course of a summer. If it lasts two summers, you made money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fidler

customer_reviews.title: Good fishing shirt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to do some flats fishing in the Keys. It was loose fitting unlike a couple of my other shirts of this type. I like the looseness and the comfort of the shirt. It kept me protected from the sun for the entire time on the boat. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well amd wore,it for 2 separate weeks in the water and no,sunburn. It did get discolored by sunscreen but that washes out. Runs a tad big and can get baggy in the water but I like mine loose. Son,likes his tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Sabot

customer_reviews.title: Good t-shirt fit rashguard
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed an alergy to most sunscreen, and wanted something I could wear on a tropical vacation without risking a respiratory attack while scuba diving.I was looking for more of a T-shirt fit than the painted-on look of many rash guards, and this delivered. I'm 5'9", currently a dismal 185lbs, and the medium gave me a pleasant T-shirt fit. I did not attempt to wear it under my wet suit. For diving, I took it off and stuffed it in my dry bag when I was ready to put on the upper half of my wetsuit. I do wish there were more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: bicycledad

customer_reviews.title: Best investment of the summer
customer_reviews.text: Best investment of the summer. Wore this in the ocean, in the pool, at the Atlantis Aquaventure resort, on the beach, snorkeling - never had any sunburn, and the shirt is really comfortable, doesn't get hot wearing it, dries nicely, and it looks good. Highly recommend! Also, for sizing, definitely go one size smaller than what you usually wear (I normally wear a Large in all of my shirts, but upon reading some of the other reviews I decided to order a Medium and it fit really well - a Large would clearly have been way too big on me).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wet dry sun coverage
customer_reviews.text: Works great, week in the sun on the beach and not 1 sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Breathable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother. I did not think he was going to like it because he gets warm easily, but he loved it. He said he is totally sold on wearing long sleeves for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Men's Large fits like a Men's XL, otherwise a great shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is very lightweight, comfortable and looks great. I ordered size Men's XL and it fit more like an XXL compared to other name brand shirts. I am 6'2" and weigh 245lbs. After exchanging for a size L, the fit was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Good all around shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Good shirt to wear to the beach or waterpark to cover up your love handles and gut. I even wear it cutting grass and doing yardwork. It’s what you were looking for. Loose fit and slimmer appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Switek

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite buys for the summer.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I didn't want the usual tight-fit rash guard. I wanted something more loose, but without being boxy and sloppy. The shirt is designed for this look, however, the first one I ordered was too small in the arms. If you have thin/skinny arms, then you'll be fine. But I couldn't bend my arms. So I sized up and it was great. One of my favorite things to wear. Also, it's still cool in the hot sun, even though it's long sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Plastic Neon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Every single shirt in my closet is XL. This firs good all over but sleeves are 1-2” too long. drives me crazy and shrinking attempt provided very little relief.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sun protection, feels like nothing on the body.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sun protection, feels like nothing on the body. I’m taking the sleeve on my diving trips almost every time and it’s allowed me to stay cool and don’t get burned. Which is more important- I don’t use harmful sunscreens
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good god, the sizing?
customer_reviews.text: Decent sun shirt especially for the price. Neck hole is a bit large. Sizing is crazy. I'm 6', weigh 175 and was swimming in a medium. A medium?! I exchanged for a small, which fits well (not tight). Are we so fat as a country that 6'/175lbs is now a size small?
customer_reviews.author: MARK S

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt keeps the sun off and I haven't been burned while wearing it. Obviously everyone is different, but I burn easily and so far this shirt is great. Doesn't weigh you down in the water and feels really good. Drys quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: The best buy out there!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for days on Amazon trying to find the most comfortable, well made long sleeve shirt that I can wear for UV protection just about anywhere needed. Look no further. Not only is it extremely comfortable, but stylish and attractive enough to wear out casually. I ordered 3 more within minutes of trying it on.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Went to Jamaica. I'm pale with freckles and should not be south of Ireland. Wore sun screen on my neck and face and this shirt kept 95% of the sun off of me. I may have received a tiny bit of sun through it after a week in the sun, but only showed with slightly darker shoulder freckles. Absolutely ZERO pinkness or sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I ended up getting a small and it fits a lot better.
customer_reviews.text: As explained in the description, these shirts run large. I am 5'8 and 160#. I got the medium and once in the water it was floating and billowing around me. I ended up getting a small and it fits a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Eli W.

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for dual purpose: to wear as sunblock shirt under short-sleeved shirt and taking grandson to a water park. Didn't want a body-hugging shirt and am pleased that this isn't. It looks good for wearing around town, I just fold up the bottom of the very long sleeve that otherwise covers my hand. Tried it in the pool and had to tuck bottom in swimsuit so it wouldn't ride up. It does cling when wet but provides the sun protection I am seeking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not sized correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a large or a medium in this type of shirt but typically a large. The "large" size of this would swallow an elephant! Easily an XL and maybe even bigger than that. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dave U.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT swim tee / excellent fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swim tee for a sailing trip and was VERY happy I did. Great protection from the sun, great feel (very light) and the fit was perfect (not too tight, not too loose). I'll be buying a couple more of these just for regular wear. Great looking color as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection plus
customer_reviews.text: I am in the pool every day..mostly DWR for an hour minimum.It protects great..oversized, but don’t care.Well made..love it! Would buy again..😉
customer_reviews.author: G Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Real sizing info (not weight & height)
customer_reviews.text: Size down for a regular fit; size down twice for more fitted. Im 5’6” and have an athletic physique with a 39” chest and 30” waist. Ordered a small and it fits loose like Nike medium shirts. This “swim shirt” measures 20.5” across the torso and has 35” sleeves. I intend to wear during long periods in warm waters (surfing/snorkeling) or when I forgo reapplying sunblock. Wished Xsmall was available and same color stitching. See attached pics.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Great sun protection and durability. More of a classic fit than a tight fit, which is what I was looking for. Have spent days in the water on this, both sea and pools, and still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Erock

customer_reviews.title: Snags easily
customer_reviews.text: I just wore it around the house for a week and got several snags and don't even know how I got them. I can't imagine going kayaking while wearing it. You will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tron

customer_reviews.title: NIce UPF shirt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to wear when I'm out in the sun, either working in the yard or out on the boat. I HATE putting on sunscreen and this is a great alternative (doesn't help your head though :)). Fit - Sleeves are longer than a normal shirt and it is longer in the torso too. It fit a little tighter than a normal t-shirt, but wasn't skin tight like Under Armor. I wear XL and I ordered XL. Shirt is very light weight and slightly opaque (the white shirt).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for swimming in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of getting sunburns no matter how much sunblock I'd put on, rash guards are the answer! This fits well, and doesn't bunch when swimming. Dries quickly too. I have a tighter fitting rash guard, but I'm not in the best shape right now so this looser fitting one is great until I drop the weight. I wore this one for a day at the waterpark, no sunburn at all on the parts it covered. I coupled it with some UV rated shorts and a visor, it was much easier to keep my neck/legs well applied with sun block without having to do my entire torso.
customer_reviews.author: Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself from the sun
customer_reviews.text: One year I went to Hawaii, snorkeled for one day in the bay and spent the next 3 weeks in pain from second degree burns from the sun. I've never had anything like this happen to me before in my life and I was quite surprised by how badly I was burned. The next time I went to Hawaii, I also snorkeled for one day in the bay only this time with this shirt. No sun burn! Also, I found the shirt was easy to wash off in the hotel sink and was good to go the next day. Even though I did not launder it, it never got too stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Van Derpas

customer_reviews.title: Not for thin build
customer_reviews.text: Unflattering loose fit around armpits/shoulders for my thin build husband. This fit is for men with very broad shoulders and/or upper body muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this size because I wanted a more fitted size and a different color. I already have a white size LARGE. White didn’t work as well when wet (to much transparency). Great fabric and confort.
customer_reviews.author: IQM3

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Umm not sure what happened but I wore it once in the ocean and then it had black marks all over it, tried to wash it but it didnt work. Horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size larger than 'true', and still has a slightly loose fit
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to previous reviewers I ordered a Large for my husband instead of an XL, and it was perfect! He's 5'10", 210 lbs and quite muscular - he often has a hard time with shirts being tight on his arms and around his chest, but this shirt has just the right amount of room and is a little on the long side compared to regular surf shirts, so that made it a great shirt for all beach/pool activities. If you are a really slender build, you may want to go another size down. Fabric is of good quality and cut and seems are well done.
customer_reviews.author: MVNB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not All Day Protection
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and love the look but SPF 50? I wore it and still got burned on my mid back and shoulders despite being fully covered all day in the water. I wonder if this is a legit product and not a knock off. If you use this then make sure you still layer up in sunblock.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: the material was tightly woven and lightweight as expected. I am short, so the torso was much too long for me. I tried a similar shirt by Tuga for a similar price point (also available on Amazon), and it fit more snugly and had a shorter torso. because of the reason for return I was able to mail it back to Amazon for free. thumbs up for that.
customer_reviews.author: D-n-J

customer_reviews.title: very nice merchandise / Speedo
customer_reviews.text: I used my new Speedo swim suit cover-up for the first time today at the pool and in the pool. It was very comfortable and soft, a little baggy, didn't float up in the water, and was reasonably priced. I am assuming that I will not have a sunburn due to the 50+ sun protection rating. I ordered the men's xl because that is usually what I wear and it fit nicely, just how I wanted it to so it would be easy to remove wet. I am anxious to see if it dries quickly because I want to wear it again tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Louise S S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Very Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for snorkeling and it does the job and does it well. I prefer the loose fit and still get the sun protection I was looking for. It's well made and is still going strong after numerous exposures to tropical sun and salt water. Excellent product at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: I like this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I like this shirt.. Bought it for my husband in Med. He is a slim fit Med type and this was too big. I will need to exchange it. It is also long in the sleeve length . It goes to his knuckles. The construction is great though. Just sad that it doesn't fit tighter. I bought it for him for when he goes fishing. Sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I hate sunscreen just because of the film it leaves on ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this all summer. I hate sunscreen just because of the film it leaves on your skin. This allowed me to reduce the amount I used by a lot. Also, on some hot days I used it to just get soaking wet. As water evaporates quickly from it I was cooled down. It's pretty much worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kwabina

customer_reviews.title: this one fits like you expect
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most rash shirts, this one fits like you expect. Rash shirts are designed to be snug, but the first one I got, at a larger size, was uncomfortably snug. I needed one to protect from sunburn for a winter vacation to the tropics. The idea was for beach wear and snorkeling. This one worked perfectly! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Ilvento

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was heading far south in the dead of winter to kayak and snorkel, so I needed good sun protection. This filled the bill, including having extended sleeves to shield the backs of my hands. It allows a good range of motion and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E. Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Swim Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. It runs large but he likes his stuff big so it worked out. He is 5"7 and weighs about 175 lbs. He wanted the Large. The shirt works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shirt
customer_reviews.text: This my preferred shirt for hot sunny days when I hit the pool. I have an o’neil brand as well that is a good quality but I prefer this one as it’s very light but still provides excellent protection.
customer_reviews.author: K Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Chubby guy that wears a swim shirt to the beach so you "don't get sunburned". Yep, that's me. I also wear this cutting the grass and in the pool. Hey man it's works for me. Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for a 5'11", 210lb feller. The arms are a little long but thats the way I prefer them to be. I can't believe how the shirt keeps you so cool wet or dry. If you get it wet and take it off beware its a sob to put back on wet!
customer_reviews.author: mclayton

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am not a small person. I carry most of my extra weight in my torso. I ended up ordering the XXL assuming it would be tighter. The shirt fits me fine throughout the torso, but is tight in the shoulders and biceps. I by no means have big arms for my size. It seems like they took large arms and just added more material to the torso to upsize it. In addition, the neck line is large. I was hoping it would be snug around my neck to provide more coverage, but it actually sags open.
customer_reviews.author: Jerssmith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, lightweight, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great sun protection, cool for multiple purposes like hiking and swimming. Purchase for a trip to a tropical destination in 90 degree weather. Sleeves were a little longer than preferred but still was great sun shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Gonz85

customer_reviews.title: It took a licking and it kept on not sticking
customer_reviews.text: This was really perfect for me, and I gave it hell. I hiked in it, swam in it, and literally rolled around in red mud. The shirt never felt clingy or uncomfortable no matter how wet or sweaty I got. I appreciated the athletic fit and styling. I didn't look like I was wearing a sack. Over the course of two weeks, I got it utterly filthy, and it always cleaned up well and didn't stretch or tear.
customer_reviews.author: nomadd

customer_reviews.title: This is a *tall* rashguard!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised these aren't labeled as tall, because they definitely are sized that way. The size medium that I received was closer to a typical size large in the body in both width and length and I would guess that the sleeve length on the medium is about 36.5 inches. Fits great! The only thing I could really ask for is a higher neck for more sun protection. It just has a regular crew neck.
customer_reviews.author: Gamut

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, not snug like rash guards
customer_reviews.text: Fits loosely. I'm 6'5" 240 lbs and the size is just right for me. Sleeves also fit well; they're not too short. Most rash guards are too tight for me. I need sun protection when gardening or boating. This is too loose for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Robert, Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome! Fit big, get the next size down
customer_reviews.text: I went whitewater rafting wearing the shirt. I read another review that said to order a size smaller. I'm a large & so I ordered a medium. Fit perfectly. I also read to wash it 1st. It had a factory smell but gone after washing it the first time. On the river, it wicked the water off my skin & dried quickly. I did't get cold. I applied sunscreen to my legs about every 45 min & still got burned but under the shirt was great. It totally blocked the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Foster

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get burned at all and the shirt was quite cool, almost like not wearing anything at all
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my vacation in Florida after a long winter in the Northeast. I didn't get burned at all and the shirt was quite cool, almost like not wearing anything at all. Fits a little large to size, which was fine by me as it allowed a nice breeze in.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Towles

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this shirt for a friend. He referees 5 days a week, often in the middle of the day, during hot Utah summers. He said the shirt is very comfortable and does a great job of repelling the sun. In addition, great moisture wicking.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Field

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice rash guard. Well made and protective. Our pool is in direct sunlight all day and I've had no issues wearing this and not getting burned. Much better than slathering on sunblock every time I go in the pool. This item does fit more loosely than other rash guards I've tried. So if you want it very form fitting either go a size smaller or go with something different. Works for me though.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great Swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: As I've gotten older I'm no longer concerned with having a nice tan. I'd rather not get sunburned or hassle with applying sunscreen every where. This shirt works great for me. I used it for hours snorkeling in Maui and I was totally comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Snags on everything
customer_reviews.text: Had runs in it the first day even before i got to the beach. Hangs funny. Keeps the sun off and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Von Nobzez

customer_reviews.title: Nice for outdoors not swimming
customer_reviews.text: Definitely loose fit. Not really for swimming and water sports. But more for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: ZPTN615Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Son took to backpacking trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a backpacking trip. Son basically wore this the whole two weeks. He liked it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the white one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 2 colors for my husband. The blue is great. He liked the white but after a couple of wearings, the neck area became very discolored. I would purchase more of these but avoid white.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Ok shirt but sleeves are too long
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok shirt but the sleeves are way too long which means it’s a pain after you get wet. I’ve never had an issue with long sleeves on other shirts.
customer_reviews.author: TKF69

customer_reviews.title: Loose Fit Rashguard!!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent for those who do not like rashgiards due to most of them being tight. Its loose and size fits as expected. Material looks good although I havent used it much yet. Would buy a 2nd color if the others werent twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: EL KEVO

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: The shirt performed perfectly. Kept me cool and not sunburned, while spending the day in the hot sun at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Great option for pool shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my child and it worked great. He was able to swim with it as it is very light weight. Great protection under the steaming hot summer in FL.
customer_reviews.author: La Peyi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is awesome. This shirt protected me from the Mexican sun for a fun week. No sunburn- fit great- not have t- just awesome- was amazed
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it the one day he wore it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had me order this shirt for him. He does a lot of swimming and thought it looked good. Our son & grandson were visiting and decided to go snorkeling in Key Largo. His new shirt arrived just in time! They had a great day of snorkeling and he said the shirt worked perfectly. Now it was time to wash the shirt. No where to be found! We are guessing someone in Key Largo is sporting a nice Navy size Large. I hope it comes back up on a lightening deal!
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for preventing sun burn at the beach
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Speedo Men's UPF 50+ Easy Long Sleeve Rashguard Swim Tee to prevent rash and sunburn while I went up and down the waves at Rehoboth Beach in Delaware. It worked great and dried fast enough for use the next day. This product did exactly what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Bioguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and wear. Do not buy white if you are going to swim in a pool, it changes color and stains easily
customer_reviews.author: Mechita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use on a trip where I would be diving. Once they got wet, they didn't dry out quickly and remained cold and clammy for some time. Plus, they snag easily. I have other brands of tees that dry out quickly and are generally more comfortable. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Speedo Men's Uv Swim Shirt Long Sleeve Loose Fit Easy Tee
product_meta.description: Stay protected from the sun with a lightweight, quick-drying short sleeve swim tee designed with long sleeves for extra coverage. UV and UPF 50+ protection with Speedo’s Block the Burn technology keeps you shielded from the sun’s harmful rays all day long, in and out of the water. Relaxed and loose-fitting design makes for comfortable, breathable movement all day long. Highlights UV & UPF 50+ protection Quick-drying & lightweight material Durable & loose-fitting Long raglan sleeve 100% Polyester.
feature_bullets: UV Block the Burn with UPF 50+ protective fabric
